articles.title: Udhayanidhi Stalin likely to become Tamil Nadu Deputy Chief Minister: Sources - India Today

articles.content: The ruling DMK government in Tamil Nadu is likely to elevate Sports Minister Udhayanidhi Stalin to Deputy Chief Minister, sources told India Today. This move is similar to that of his father, MK Stal… [+1105 chars]

articles.title: TCS, LTIMindtree, Other IT Stocks Power Nifty Past 24,800, New All-Time High - Benzinga India
articles.description: Nifty 50 closes higher at 24,800.85, led by LTIMindtree's strong performance and upbeat commentary after Q1 results. Bajaj Auto among top losers.
articles.content: On Thursday, Nifty 50 shrugged off early jitters and closed 0.76% up at 24,800.85. The benchmark index hit a new all-time high of 24,837.75. LTIMindtree led the gainers, while Asian Paints was the bi… [+2860 chars]
